content: This is wonderful. I feel like you are saying what I want to say and promptly wrote, then deleted yesterday, after being embarrassed about it. How ‘having it all’ and multitasking my 100 daily checklist burnt me out and was making me dig my own grave. And here I am after having a panic attack this morning and being sick to my stomach, trying to do what the writers of false promises and dreams told me to do. To chase my dreams. They certainly are NOT being kind. We can’t all have it all.
